---

```{r}
Evelinas_n = 5
Evelinas_mean = (10+20+30+40+50)/Evelinas_n
Evelinas_variance = ((10-Evelinas_mean)^2+(20-Evelinas_mean)^2+(30-Evelinas_mean)^2+(40-Evelinas_mean)^2+(50-Evelinas_mean)^2)/(Evelinas_n-1)
Evelinas_mean; Evelinas_variance
```
